dashboard.label: Executive View
dashboard.definition:
{"dataSources":{"ds_search_1_new":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true values(Authentication.user) as user, count from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication where `infosec-cloud-indexes` Authentication.action=* by _time,Authentication.src span=10m
| rename "Authentication.*" as "*" 
| iplocation src 
| stats count by Country | geom geo_countries allFeatures=true featureIdField=Country","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"}}},"ds_search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| tstats count where `infosec-cloud-indexes` by sourcetype
| lookup cloud_vendor_services sourcetype OUTPUT vendor 
| eval vendor=mvindex(vendor,0) 
| stats values(vendor) as clouds 
| eval value=10 
| eval clouds=mvjoin(clouds, ", "), range="guarded"","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h","latest":"now"}},"name":"Cloud providers search"},"ds_search_2":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Intrusion_Detection.IDS_Attacks where `infosec-cloud-indexes` IDS_Attacks.severity!=informational earliest=-48h latest=-24h 
| append 
 [| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Intrusion_Detection.IDS_Attacks where `infosec-cloud-indexes` IDS_Attacks.severity!=informational earliest=-24h latest=now] 
| appendcols 
 [| makeresults 
 | eval time=now() 
 ] 
| rename time AS _time","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"}},"name":"Attacks"},"ds_search_3":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true dc(Authentication.user) from datamodel=Authentication where `infosec-cloud-indexes`","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-48h","latest":"now"}},"name":"Users"},"ds_search_4":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true dc(Authentication.user) as users from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication where `infosec-cloud-indexes`earliest=-30d@d latest=now groupby _time span=1d","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-7d@h","latest":"now"}},"name":"User trend"},"ds_search_5":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true sum(All_Traffic.bytes) as volume from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic where `infosec-cloud-indexes` earliest=-30d@d latest=now groupby _time span=1d 
| eval volume=round(volume/1024/1024/1024,2)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-7d@h","latest":"now"}},"name":"Traffic trend"},"ds_map":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Intrusion_Detection.IDS_Attacks where `infosec-cloud-indexes` IDS_Attacks.severity!=informational by IDS_Attacks.src 
| rename "IDS_Attacks.*" as "*" 
| iplocation src 
| stats count by Country | geom geo_countries allFeatures=true featureIdField=Country","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"}},"name":"Map"}},"visualizations":{"viz_map_1":{"type":"viz.geojson.world","options":{"drilldown":"none","mapping.choroplethLayer.colorBins":5,"mapping.choroplethLayer.colorMode":"auto","mapping.choroplethLayer.maximumColor":"0xaf575a","mapping.choroplethLayer.minimumColor":"0x62b3b2","mapping.choroplethLayer.neutralPoint":0,"mapping.choroplethLayer.shapeOpacity":0.75,"mapping.choroplethLayer.showBorder":1,"mapping.data.maxClusters":100,"mapping.legend.placement":"bottomright","mapping.map.center":"(0,0)","mapping.map.panning":1,"mapping.map.scrollZoom":0,"mapping.map.zoom":2,"mapping.markerLayer.markerMaxSize":50,"mapping.markerLayer.markerMinSize":10,"mapping.markerLayer.markerOpacity":0.8,"mapping.showTiles":1,"mapping.tileLayer.maxZoom":7,"mapping.tileLayer.minZoom":0,"mapping.tileLayer.tileOpacity":1,"mapping.type":"choropleth","trellis.enabled":0,"trellis.scales.shared":1,"trellis.size":"medium","projection":"mercator","fillColor":"#EAEFF2","strokeColor":"#333333","selector":".feature","logicalBounds":{"x":{"min":0,"max":800},"y":{"min":0,"max":600}},"name":"world","source":"geo://default/world","sourceBounds":{"lat":{"min":-60,"max":85},"long":{"min":-180,"max":180}},"strokeHighlightColor":"#DDDDDD"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_1_new"},"encoding":{"featureId":"primary[0]","fill":{"field":"primary[1]","format":{"type":"gradient","values":["#B5B5B5","#FF0000"]}}},"title":"User Locations"},"viz_map":{"type":"viz.geojson.world","encoding":{"featureId":"primary[0]","fill":{"field":"primary[1]","format":{"type":"gradient","values":["#B5B5B5","#FF0000"]}},"value":"primary[2]"},"options":{"mapping.choroplethLayer.colorBins":5,"mapping.choroplethLayer.colorMode":"auto","mapping.choroplethLayer.neutralPoint":0,"mapping.choroplethLayer.shapeOpacity":0.75,"mapping.choroplethLayer.showBorder":1,"mapping.data.maxClusters":100,"mapping.legend.placement":"bottomright","mapping.map.center":"(28.38,8.35)","mapping.map.panning":1,"mapping.map.scrollZoom":0,"mapping.markerLayer.markerMaxSize":50,"mapping.markerLayer.markerMinSize":20,"mapping.type":"choropleth","refresh.display":"progressbar","name":"WORLD","source":"geo://default/world","projection":"mercator","sourceBounds":{"lat":{"min":-60,"max":85},"long":{"min":-180,"max":180}},"logicalBounds":{"x":{"min":0,"max":1200},"y":{"min":0,"max":1200}},"fillColor":"#EAEFF2","strokeColor":"#333333","strokeHighlightColor":"#DDDDDD","selector":".feature"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_map"},"title":"Attack Origins"},"viz_single_1":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","options":{"colorMode":"block","drilldown":"none","numberPrecision":0,"refresh.display":"progressbar","sparklineDisplay":"below","trendDisplay":"absolute","trellis.enabled":0,"trellis.scales.shared":1,"trellis.size":"medium","unitPosition":"after","shouldUseThousandSeparators":true,"majorValue":"> sparklineValues | lastPoint()","trendValue":"> sparklineValues | delta(-2)","sparklineValues":"> primary | seriesByName('clouds')","backgroundColor":"transparent","majorColor":"#0877a6"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_1"},"title":"Cloud Providers Monitored"},"viz_single_2":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","options":{"colorMode":"block","drilldown":"none","numberPrecision":0,"refresh.display":"progressbar","sparklineDisplay":"off","trendDisplay":"percent","trellis.enabled":0,"trellis.scales.shared":1,"trellis.size":"medium","trendInterval":"-24h","unitPosition":"after","shouldUseThousandSeparators":true,"backgroundColor":"transparent","majorColor":"#dc4e41","trendColor":"> trendValue | rangeValue(trendColorEditorConfig)"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_2"},"title":"Attack Attempts Identified (Last 24 Hours)","context":{"convertedColorRange":[{"to":0,"value":"#1C6B2D"},{"from":0,"value":"#9E2520"}],"trendColorEditorConfig":[{"value":"#1c6b2d","to":0},{"value":"#dc4e41","from":0}]}},"viz_single_3":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","options":{"colorMode":"block","drilldown":"none","numberPrecision":0,"refresh.display":"progressbar","sparklineDisplay":"below","trendDisplay":"absolute","trellis.enabled":0,"trellis.scales.shared":1,"trellis.size":"medium","unitPosition":"after","shouldUseThousandSeparators":true,"backgroundColor":"transparent","majorColor":"#0877a6"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_3"},"title":"Cloud Users Protected","context":{"convertedColorRange":[{"from":0,"value":"#006d9c"},{"to":0,"value":"#dc4e41"}]}},"viz_chart_1":{"type":"splunk.line","options":{},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_4"},"title":"User Trend over 30 days","context":{},"showProgressBar":false,"showLastUpdated":false},"viz_chart_2":{"type":"splunk.line","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_5"},"title":"Network Traffic Volume Trend over 30 Days","options":{"yAxisAbbreviation":"auto","y2AxisAbbreviation":"auto","showRoundedY2AxisLabels":false,"legendTruncation":"ellipsisMiddle","showY2MajorGridLines":true,"xAxisLabelRotation":0,"xAxisTitleVisibility":"hide","yAxisTitleText":"GB","yAxisTitleVisibility":"show","y2AxisTitleVisibility":"show","yAxisScale":"linear","showOverlayY2Axis":0,"y2AxisScale":"inherit","nullValueDisplay":"gaps","dataValuesDisplay":"off","showSplitSeries":0,"showIndependentYRanges":0,"legendMode":"standard","legendDisplay":"off","lineWidth":7},"context":{}}},"inputs":{},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"display":"auto-scale","showTitleAndDescription":false,"backgroundColor":"#212526","height":1070},"structure":[{"item":"viz_map","type":"block","position":{"x":40,"y":400,"w":520,"h":390}},{"item":"viz_single_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":20,"w":400,"h":100}},{"item":"viz_single_2","type":"block","position":{"x":400,"y":20,"w":400,"h":100}},{"item":"viz_single_3","type":"block","position":{"x":800,"y":20,"w":400,"h":100}},{"item":"viz_chart_1","type":"block","position":{"x":30,"y":120,"w":570,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_chart_2","type":"block","position":{"x":610,"y":120,"w":570,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_map_1","type":"block","position":{"x":640,"y":400,"w":520,"h":390}}],"globalInputs":[]},"title":"Executive View","description":"","defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{}}}}}}
